ValidationRule.description: Update number of participants and $ amount before closing adjustment case
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED(Status) && ISPICKVAL( Status , "Resolved") && NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT( Adjustment_Type__c ))) && ( ISBLANK( Dollar_Amount_of_Adjustment__c ) || ISBLANK( Number_of_Participants_to_Adjust__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Dollar Amount of Adjustment" and "Number of Participants to Adjust" must be entered before closing adjustment cases.
